# vImage.MorphologyOperation.minimize(kernelSize:)

**Case**

Minimizes using an implicit kernel of a specified size.

## Declaration

```swift
case minimize(kernelSize: vImage.Size)
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **vImage.MorphologyOperation.dilate(structuringElement:)**: Applies dilation using a structuring element.
- **vImage.MorphologyOperation.erode(structuringElement:)**: Applies erosion using a structuring element.
- **vImage.MorphologyOperation.maximize(kernelSize:)**: Maximizes using an implicit kernel of a specified size.
